name: SUN GOD
description:
SUN GOD is a game about making a sacrifice to a cosmic god to escape the impending apocalypse. Navigate your spaceship around the star system and collect people before blasting off into the Sun. Your time is limited since the universe is rapidly contracting. Made in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 38 Compo.

This game uses the LibHandDis font under OFL.

Controls:
WASD - move
E - land on planets/SUN
Mouse - rotate the ship (does not really do anything)
